effect.exoskills.patience.description: Increases luck by .2, mana regen by 2%, ranged strength by .75%, and passive critical chance by 1.5% per level.
effect.exoskills.looters_luck.descriptio: Increases luck by .5 per level, can be stacked with regular luck.
item.exoskills.onyx.jei.info: Combine with any damageable piece of equipment in a smithing table to increase it's max durability by 20%.
item.exoskills.lucky_essence.jei.info: Can be brewed into luck potions or used to highlight nearby, unlooted, chests.
item.exoskills.boon.use: You feel empowered from the boon.
item.exoskills.boon.use.already_used: You have already gained the benefits of this boon.
item.exoskills.arcane_singularity.info.e: Damaged entities take double fire damage
item.exoskills.arcane_singularity.jei.in: Combine in an anvil with gear that contains the singularity's requirement to unlock special effects.
item.exoskills.horizon_of_fate.use.rewar: You wished for great knowledge, has fate answered your call?
item.exoskills.horizon_of_fate.jei.info: Can be used in place of lapis when enchanting to unlock treasure limited enchants. (Curses are included)
item.exoskills.horizon_of_fate.info.1: Use to gain a random amount of XP, or,
item.exoskills.horizon_of_fate.info.2: use in place of lapis when enchanting to
item.exoskills.horizon_of_fate.info.3: gain the ability to roll limited enchants.
enchantment.exoskills.high_quality.desc: A high quality craft, effects differ depending on the item.
enchantment.exoskills.masterwork.desc: A masterwork craft, effects differ depending on the item.
singularity.exoskills.unbreakable_bond.d: to convert 25%% of the damage into
While this item has full durability,
it will not take durability damage
singularity.exoskills.shock_absorption.d: absorption equal to 20%% of the damage
up to a maximum of 8 absorption.
singularity.exoskills.thermal_conductivi: has a 20%% chance to cause a flare.
